Main Street
Town Hall, Middlesbrough, North Yorkshire The trophy awarded for this contest says Lynemouth Colliery Band, not Lingdale. 7 bands competed.
Dec. 11, 2011, 3:13 p.m. Dec. 1, 2014, 4:30 p.m.
1 Lingdale Silver Band Alan Morrison
2 Broughtons Brass [Durham] Albert Haswell

4 Pride Valley Brass Gordon Kitto
